original_text: But perhaps an angel may come to help one of those people. He may speak on behalf of God, as a special angel among the many thousands of God's angels. The angel may tell that person how to live in a way that is right. But perhaps an angel may come to help one of those people. He may speak on behalf of God, as a special angel among the many thousands of God's angels. The angel may tell that person how to live in a way that is right. But perhaps an angel may come to help one of those people. He may speak on behalf of God, as a special angel among the many thousands of God's angels. The angel may tell that person how to live in a way that is right. But perhaps an angel may come
korean_text: 만일 일천 천사 가운데 하나가 그 사람의 중보자로 함께 있어서 그의 정당함을 보일진대

sentences.original_text: But perhaps an angel may come
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어쩌면 한 천사가 올 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: to help one of those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들 중 한 명을 돕기 위해

sentences.original_text: He may speak on behalf of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님을 대신하여 말할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: as a special angel
sentences.korean_translation: 특별한 천사로서

sentences.original_text: among the many thousands of God's angels
sentences.korean_translation: 수천 명의 하나님의 천사들 중에서

sentences.original_text: The angel may tell that person
sentences.korean_translation: 그 천사는 그 사람에게 말할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: how to live in a way that is right
sentences.korean_translation: 올바른 방식으로 살아가는 방법을
